channel.title: Connection lost...username is already logged in
channel.description: ok so i run testscape source on hamachi and it works fine for me but when other people log in it says connection lsot and they log out and when they try again it says username is already logged in how can i stop this problem if you can please send me a tut for this problem[br][size=1]Posted on: March 07, 2007, 06:57:46 PM[/size][hr]i still am stuck please respond

item.title: Connection lost...username is already logged in
item.dc:creator: @Soule Soule
item.description:
@Soule wrote:

thats because it was a sudden lost connection, and there files are still logged in, maybe dont update like every 2 mins and stuff… need any problems ask me or post a topic

Read full topic

item.title: Connection lost...username is already logged in
item.dc:creator: @justtesting justtesting
item.description:
@justtesting wrote:

death4u4222:

ok so i run testscape source on hamachi and it works fine for me but when other people log in it says connection lsot and they log out and when they try again it says username is already logged in how can i stop this problem if you can please send me a tut for this problem[br][size=1]Posted on: March 07, 2007, 06:57:46 PM[/size][hr]i still am stuck please respond

If you just edited your stats or somthing(gave your self to much of an item(over 2.**bil)) It will do that to. If you get this error… try one to or all three

  1. restart it
  2. find what you just edited and look it over…
  3. Change parts of it back till you find the problem

Read full topic
